meanings.definition: The state or condition of being hypertonic.
meanings.sent1: The hypertonicities of the solution caused the cells to shrink.
meanings.sent2: Doctors monitored the patient's hypertonicities to ensure proper treatment.
meanings.sent3: The hypertonicities of the saltwater made the fish float comically.
meanings.sent4: Her voice carried a sense of hypertonicities, commanding attention in the room.
meanings.sent5: The hypertonicities of the music filled the hall, making everyone tap their feet.

meanings.definition: The quality of having an increased tone or tension in muscles.
meanings.sent1: Physical therapy helped relieve the hypertonicities in his muscles.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often experience hypertonicities after intense workouts.
meanings.sent3: The hypertonicities in his arms made him look like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her dance movements displayed a unique hypertonicities, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The hypertonicities in his grip made it impossible to escape his hold.
